Html:
Hi,

I have followed all the steps in the doc and installed on domain

http://ikick.in/

Which is showing me error.

SERVER is shared hosting with windows 2008 server with IIS 7  and has mvc installed.

Please advice what could be the problem as when I am trying to test using wrong urls for example - http://ikick.in/TEST.ASPX, the page is working. Something is wrong with the domain default page, not sure how to do that in kigg.
No one ? Seems like project is dead...

Hi Vijayvishwakarma,

I can help you doing this.

Did you install on your local machine? Did it run fine on your local machine.

Cheers,

Narendra

Hi,

I on builded the script on localhost, tried installing directly on server.

Please advice.
